97380.name: Absorbent Parasite
97380.flavorText: Your beasts' iron levels are high, what have you been feeding them?

101685.name: Aerosoilizer
101685.flavorText: Banned in Wild for opening a hole in the ozone layer.

97495.name: Aggramar, the Avenger
97495.flavorText: Formerly a trusted lieutenant of Sargeras, Aggramar helped him fight the demonic legions across many worlds before he was corrupted.

101009.name: Alarmed Securitybot
101009.text: Deathrattle: Draw another minion. Set its Attack, Health, and Cost to 5.
101009.flavorText: THREAT LEVEL: 5! Which doesn't actually sound that bad to be honest.

97617.name: Algalon the Observer
97617.text: Battlecry: Replace your Hero Power with Algalon's Vision.
97617.flavorText: That's so Algalon, it’s the future he can see.

97049.name: Always a Bigger Jormungar
97049.text: Give a minion +2 Attack and "Excess damage dealt by attacks hits the enemy hero."
97049.flavorText: I saw it! It's big, scary, and blue!

97103.name: Aman'Thul
97103.text: Titan After this uses an ability, Discover any Legendary minion from any class.
97103.flavorText: The leader of the titans was the first to awaken. In his loneliness, he sought out other titans across many different worlds, and together, they formed the Pantheon.

98061.name: Amitus, the Peacekeeper
98061.text: Titan Taunt. Your minions can't take more than 2 damage at a time.
98061.flavorText: As a champion of harmony, Amitus abstained from the Pantheon's many conflicts until one day, shortly after the corruption of Sargeras, she vanished altogether.

97570.name: Ancient Totem
97570.flavorText: This is SO much cuter than Tinyfin.

98017.name: Ancient of Growth
98017.text: Choose One - Summon three 2/2 Treants; or Transform your Treants into 5/5 Ancients with Taunt.

97573.name: Angry Helhound
97573.flavorText: When you wake up on the all 3 wrong sides of the bed.

102040.name: Aqua Archivist
102040.text: Battlecry: The next Elemental you play costs (2) less.
102040.flavorText: Do not summon! I JUST had to put all my scrolls in rice.

97526.name: Argunite Golem
97526.text: Has +1 Attack for each card you've drawn this turn.
97526.flavorText: Golem Bling never really caught on - the fad crumbled after the Cataclysm.

98344.name: Argus, the Emerald Star
98344.text: Titan Minions to the left of this have Rush, and ones to the right have Lifesteal.
98344.flavorText: Once a proud titan, Argus was fated to meet a darker end. Sargeras and his demons would later corrupt and shatter Argus to use his power for themselves.

96422.name: Astral Automaton
96422.text: Has +1/+1 for each other Astral Automaton you've summoned this game.
96422.flavorText: You'll want to summon an automaTON of these.

100984.name: Astral Serpent
100984.text: At the end of your turn, if this didn't attack, draw 2 cards.
100984.flavorText: Call it lazy all you want, but it does have two more cards than you.

97096.name: Awakening Tremors
97096.flavorText: A rude followup to the Sleepy Tremors.

101869.name: Bait and Switch
101869.text: Secret: When a friendly minion is attacked, give it +3/+3.
101869.flavorText: Oh my god, the bait and switch works every time!

100874.name: Battleworn Faceless
100874.text: Battlecry: Transform into a copy of a damaged minion.
100874.flavorText: "I shall hug him and squeeze him and call him Earthen George."

98565.name: Bellowing Flames
98565.text: Deal 5 damage to a minion. Forge: Then deal 5 damage split among all enemy minions.
98565.flavorText: Too much bellowing. Not enough flames.

100989.name: Bestial Madness
100989.text: Give +1 Attack to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
100989.flavorText: "Hey this isn't what we were trying to excavate!"

98019.name: Careless Mechanist
98019.text: After you draw your second card in a turn, destroy this.

98403.name: Celestial Projectionist
98403.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a Temporary copy of it to your hand.
98403.flavorText: What if we're not really here, y'know? What if we're all just, like, projections in the mind of some cosmic entity? How would we know?

97098.name: Celestial Shot
97098.text: Deal 3 damage. Your next spell has Spell Damage +2.

97467.name: Chained Guardian
97467.text: Rush, Reborn Costs (1) less for each Plague shuffled into the enemy deck this game.
97467.flavorText: Eternally jealous of the Unchained Gladiator.

96933.name: Champion of Storms
96933.text: After you cast a Nature spell, summon a 4/2 Elemental. Forge: With Rush.
96933.flavorText: Has some grievances it just can't wait to air out.

98030.name: Chaotic Consumption
98030.text: Destroy a friendly minion to destroy an enemy minion.
98030.flavorText: You're not you when you're hungry.

101021.name: Chaotic Tendril
101021.text: Battlecry: Cast a random -Cost spell. Improve your future Chaotic Tendrils.
101021.flavorText: "So are you good, evil, or neutral?" "Just chaotic."

97005.name: Chill-o-matic
97005.text: Magnetic Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
97005.flavorText: After a number of island vacations, he thought the Storm Peaks would be a nice change of pace.

101841.name: Cho'gall, Twilight Chieftain
101841.text: Taunt, Lifesteal Start of Game: 50% chance to corrupt the game with a random anomaly.
101841.flavorText: He's got it all, the gumption, gall, and Cho.

101097.name: Conductivity
101097.text: The next spell you cast this turn also targets adjacent minions.
101097.flavorText: That faceless sure didn't put up a lot of (length/cross-sectional area).

98087.name: Conservator Nymph
98087.text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly Treant into a 5/5 Ancient with Taunt.
98087.flavorText: Whatever you do, don't water your Treants after midnight!

101563.name: Contaminated Lasher
101563.text: Battlecry: If you've cast 5 or more spells this game, refresh 4 Mana Crystals. ( left!) (Ready!)
101563.flavorText: He corrupts me, he corrupts me not.

97109.name: Coppertail Snoop
97109.text: Magnetic Whenever this attacks, get a Coin.
97109.flavorText: Scavenges both nuts and bolts for the winter.

97680.name: Craftsman's Hammer
97680.text: Whenever your hero attacks, gain 4 Armor.

97355.name: Crash of Thunder
97355.text: Deal 3 damage to all enemies. Costs (1) less for each Nature spell you've cast this turn.

97261.name: Creation Protocol
97261.text: Discover a copy of a minion in your deck. Forge: Get another copy.
97261.flavorText: If you want the destruction protocol, just go in reverse.

97475.name: Crystalline Statue
97475.text: Rush. Starts Dormant. After you draw 4 cards, this awakens.

98265.name: Cultivation
98265.text: Give your minions +2/+2. Costs (1) less for each Treant you've summoned this game.
98265.flavorText: Calling this an 8 mana card is missing the forest for the trees.

100887.name: Curse of Flesh
100887.text: Enemy minions cost Health instead of Mana next turn.

95935.name: Cyclopian Crusher
95935.flavorText: Really puts the rusher in crusher. Uses its one eye to C.

98058.name: Disciple of Amitus
98058.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Earthen that gains +2/+2 for each other Earthen you've summoned this game.
98058.flavorText: "Oh great Amitus, I took your style advice on the poncho, but pray tell - one or two golden gloves?"

98330.name: Disciple of Argus
98330.flavorText: "Aw nuts, I put both ends in the pencil sharpener."

98328.name: Disciple of Eonar
98328.text: Battlecry: Your next Choose One card or power has both effects combined.
98328.flavorText: If you do not receive his rose, you will have to pack your bags and leave Ulduar immediately.

97473.name: Disciple of Golganneth
97473.text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of a random Overload card in your hand by (1).
97473.flavorText: Warning: If you are not made of rocks, do not stand in lightning water.

98394.name: Disciple of Sargeras
98394.text: Battlecry: Discard a spell to summon two 3/2 Imps. Forge: Give them +2 Health and Taunt.

98111.name: Discovery of Magic
98111.text: Discover a spell from a spell school you haven't cast this game (from any class).
98111.flavorText: It's in a book, just take a look!

98389.name: Disguised K'thir
98389.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform into a random card in your opponent's deck.
98389.flavorText: That is not a very good disguise, dude.

97269.name: Distressed Kvaldir
97269.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle two random Plagues into your opponent's deck.
97269.flavorText: Oh look at that, I have been impaled.

97282.name: Down with the Ship
97282.text: Deal 3 damage. Shuffle two random Plagues into your opponent's deck.
97282.flavorText: It has been a privilege playing with you tonight.

98105.name: Drone Deconstructor
98105.text: Battlecry: Get a 1/1 Magnetic Sparkbot with a random Bonus Effect.
98105.flavorText: You have to deconstruct to reconstruct.

98212.name: Elemental Inspiration
98212.text: For each spell school you have cast this game, summon a 4/5 Vortex with a random Bonus Effect. ( )

97649.name: Embrace of Nature
97649.text: Draw a Choose One card. Forge: It has both effects combined.

101513.name: Encroaching Insanity
101513.text: Both players take Fatigue damage, twice.
101513.flavorText: Pictured here is Loken stuck at his 20th hour on Diamond 5.

96671.name: Eonar, the Life-Binder
96671.text: Titan After this uses an ability, summon a 5/5 Ancient with Taunt.
96671.flavorText: Protector of all living things, she once saved the nascent world-soul of Azeroth from annihilation. It seems mercy was her greatest wisdom.

97479.name: Eredar Deceptor
97479.text: Whenever you draw a card, summon a 1/1 Demon with Rush.
97479.flavorText: But they were all of them deceived, for another Eredar was made.

97455.name: Eulogizer
97455.text: Battlecry: Spend 3 Corpses to deal 3 damage. Forge: Gain them instead.

97051.name: Fable Stablehand
97051.text: Rush Battlecry: If you control a minion with 4 or more Attack, gain +2/+2.
97051.flavorText: She took over the job when Feeble Steeblehand left.

98252.name: False Disciple
98252.text: Battlecry: Discover a Legendary Priest minion from the past.

98104.name: Fate Splitter
98104.text: Deathrattle: Get a copy of the last card your opponent played.
98104.flavorText: "What's the matter with these scissors!? The thread won't cut!!"

97593.name: Flame Behemoth
97593.text: Battlecry: Get two random Magnetic Mechs. They cost (2) less.
97593.flavorText: Always look both ways before crossing the Formation Grounds.

98143.name: Flame Revenant
98143.text: After you summon an Elemental, give it +1/+1.

97354.name: Flash of Lightning
97354.text: Draw a card. Next turn, your Nature spells cost (1) less.

101566.name: Forbidden Fruit
101566.text: Spend all your Mana. Choose One - Gain that much Attack this turn; or twice as much Armor.
101566.flavorText: Not forbidden if you have a good dentist!

97623.name: Forge of Wills
97623.text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a Giant with its stats and Rush.
97623.flavorText: Standing in the Forge of Wills fills you with a sense of DETERMINATION.

97629.name: Freya, Keeper of Nature
97629.text: Choose One - Duplicate your hand; or Summon copies of all other friendly minions.
97629.flavorText: Good things come in pairs. Good things come in pairs.

97638.name: From the Scrapheap
97638.text: Get three 1/1 Magnetic Sparkbots with random Bonus Effects.
97638.flavorText: Well that's a load of scrap.

97627.name: Frost Lotus Seedling
97627.text: Draw 1 card. Gain 5 Armor. (Blossoms in (turn, turns).)

98427.name: Frozen Over
98427.text: Both players draw 2 cards. Your opponent can not play them next turn.
98427.flavorText: We will find out who wins when we return in the spring.

97739.name: Furious Furnace
97739.text: Magnetic Also damages minions next to whomever this attacks.

97215.name: Gear Shift
97215.text: Shuffle the two left-most cards in your hand into your deck. Draw 3 cards.

100870.name: General Vezax
100870.text: Rush Battlecry: Gain 4 Armor. Deathrattle: Lose 4 Armor to resummon this.
100870.flavorText: Contrast this with Specific Vezax, who only gets resummoned if you have exactly 4 Armor.

96909.name: Golganneth, the Thunderer
96909.text: Titan Your first spell each turn costs (3) less.
96909.flavorText: With dominion over the seas and skies, Golganneth fearlessly wields the power of nature to serve the Pantheon.

98434.name: Grace of the Highfather
98434.text: Restore 8 Health. Discover a card that costs the amount Overhealed.
98434.flavorText: The fish was thiiiiis big, can you believe it?

97683.name: Helya
97683.text: Battlecry: Shuffle all three Plagues into your opponent's deck. Plagues they draw this game are unending.
97683.flavorText: Named after the first thing Odyn said after landing a sick kickflip.

98560.name: Hodir, Father of Giants
98560.text: Battlecry: Set the stats of the next three minions you play to 8/8.
98560.flavorText: Giant ladies, this one's a Keeper.

98520.name: Ignis, the Eternal Flame
98520.text: Battlecry: If you've Forged a card this game, craft a custom weapon.

97614.name: Imprisoned Horror
97614.text: Costs (1) less for each damage you've taken on your turns this game.

101099.name: Infested Watcher
101099.flavorText: This is why you don't eat watermelon seeds.

98136.name: Inquisitive Creation
98136.text: Battlecry: Deal damage to all enemy minions. (Improved by each spell school you've cast this game!)
98136.flavorText: This mech eats books for breakfast.

98023.name: Invent-o-matic
98023.text: Whenever you Magnetize a minion, give it +1/+1.
98023.flavorText: The inventor was really proud, until they realized inventing something that invents things makes for poor job security.

98056.name: Inventor's Aura
98056.text: Your Mechs cost (1) less. Lasts turns.
98056.flavorText: Ok, fine, I'll read the manual…

97478.name: Jotun, the Eternal
97478.text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, cast a copy of the first spell you draw each turn at enemies.
97478.flavorText: He doesn't look like a turtle?

98055.name: Judge Unworthy
98055.text: Set an enemy minion's Health to 1, then deal 1 damage to all enemies.

97640.name: Kaja'mite Creation
97640.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from another class that costs (3) or less.
97640.flavorText: You made this? I made this.

101006.name: Keeper's Strength
101006.text: Give a friendly minion +2/+2. Deal its Attack damage to all other minions.

96710.name: Khaz'goroth
96710.text: Titan After this uses an ability, gain Immune this turn and attack a random enemy minion.
96710.flavorText: Creator of the titan-forged races, Khaz'goroth intended them to safeguard the world of Azeroth from corruption and discord.

100929.name: Kologarn
100929.text: Rush. Whenever this attacks a minion, put it in your hand. Deathrattle: Move any in your hand to your opponent's.
100929.flavorText: "So am I just supposed to stand here forever, or...?"

97915.name: Lab Constructor
97915.text: At the end of your turn, summon a copy of this. Forge: Gain Magnetic.

100093.name: Lifebinder's Gift
100093.text: Choose One - Get 2 random Nature spells; or Reduce the Cost of spells in your hand by (1).
100093.flavorText: Everyone's investing in Nature spells these days, but that bubble is about to burst.

96077.name: Lightning Reflexes
96077.text: Discover a Nature spell. If you play it this turn, Discover another.
96077.flavorText: If you can dodge a lightning bolt, you can dodge a ball.

98280.name: Loken, Jailer of Yogg-Saron
98280.text: Battlecry: Discover a minion from your deck. Summon a Tentacle with its stats and Taunt.
98280.flavorText: Really great at his job! - Yogg-Saron

98182.name: Mecha-Leaper
98182.text: Magnetic Deathrattle: Give a friendly Mech +2/+2 and this Deathrattle.
98182.flavorText: Now to find my Mecha-Macaw and my Mecha-Titus and we'll be Mecha-Set.

96941.name: Mechagnome Guide
96941.flavorText: Theme park? Tropical island? Fiery pit of despair? We've got something for everyone.

101075.name: Meddlesome Servant
101075.text: Battlecry: If you've cast 5 or more spells this game, draw 2 cards. ( left!) (Ready!)
101075.flavorText: Has successfully gotten away with it too.

97853.name: Melted Maker
97853.text: After you Forge a card, get a copy of it.
97853.flavorText: Melts what he makes (cheese) and makes a mean melt (grilled cheese).

97078.name: Mimiron, the Mastermind
97078.text: After you play a Mech, get a random one of Mimiron's Gadgets.

101661.name: Mindbender
101661.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage for each card you have drawn this turn. ( )
101661.flavorText: I like my brain unbent, thanks.

97678.name: Minotauren
97678.text: Rush Whenever this minion deals damage, gain that much Armor.
97678.flavorText: "Why's he so mad?" "He's been stuck on one of Hearthstone's hidden maze puzzles for YEARS."

98123.name: Molten Rune
98123.text: Deal 3 damage. Get a random spell. Forge: This casts twice.
98123.flavorText: It's post-ancient modern realist neoclassical impressionist art. No idea what it means though.

97477.name: Momentum
97477.text: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn. Costs (1) less for each card you've drawn this turn.

98278.name: Monstrous Form
98278.text: Give a friendly minion +3/+3 until your next turn.

97530.name: Mortal Eradication
97530.text: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all enemy minions. Restore 2 Health to your hero for each killed.
97530.flavorText: Clearly anything with 6 or more health is immortal. Such as Street Trickster. We are nerfing Street Trickster for lore accuracy.

101112.name: Muscle-o-Tron
101112.text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1. Forge: +2/+2 instead.

98469.name: Mythical Terror
98469.text: Lifesteal At the end of your turn, force all enemy minions to attack this.
98469.flavorText: You cannot pet the Terror in Hearthstone.

98054.name: Noble Minibot
98054.text: Magnetic After this attacks, give a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
98054.flavorText: I always get the minibot with the wobbly wheel.

96903.name: Norgannon
96903.text: Titan After this uses an ability, double the power of the other abilities.
96903.flavorText: His tremendous arcane magic was strong enough to save all of the spirits of the titans after Sargeras destroyed their physical forms.

98282.name: Northern Navigation
98282.text: Discover a spell from your deck. If it's a Frost spell, Freeze a random enemy minion.
98282.flavorText: Leads directly to Greatfather Winter's workshop.

97047.name: Observer of Myths
97047.text: After you summon a minion with more Attack than this, give all friendly minions +1 Attack.

97061.name: Odyn, Prime Designate
97061.text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, after your hero gains Armor, they gain that much Attack for that turn.
97061.flavorText: The best offense is a good defense. 30 defense to be exact.

97825.name: Pit Stop
97825.text: Discover a Mech from your deck. Give it +2/+1.

101698.name: Prison Breaker
101698.text: Battlecry: If you've cast 5 or more spells this game, deal 2 damage to all enemies. ( left!) (Ready!)
101698.flavorText: Flavor fail! Demolition Renovator did it FIRST!

97406.name: Prison of Yogg-Saron
97406.text: Choose a character. Cast 4 random spells (targeting it if possible).
97406.flavorText: "We've finally captured Yogg-Saron! How should we keep him contained?" "How about... an open pit... right below us... with four loose chains?" "PERFECT!"

98223.name: Ra-den
98223.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Summon each other minion you've played this game that did not start in your deck.

98680.name: Ravenous Kraken
98680.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion. Deathrattle: Summon a copy of it.
98680.flavorText: He's witewally hitting the squiddy wight now.

97352.name: Razorscale
97352.flavorText: A razorscale, razormane, and razorclaw walk into the tavern.

98051.name: Relentless Worg
98051.text: Rush After this attacks and kills a minion, restore this to full Health.
98051.flavorText: It's the Year of the Worg! Wait - what do you mean 'wolf'?

97574.name: Runefueled Golem
97574.flavorText: Hmm, glyph gauge is running low. Better fill up at the next town.

101012.name: Runes of Darkness
101012.text: Discover a weapon. Spend 3 Corpses to give it +1/+1.

97527.name: Runic Adornment
97527.text: Discover a spell that costs (3) or less. Shuffle 2 copies into your deck that Cast When Drawn.
97527.flavorText: Rune, rune on the wall, who's the greenest of them all?

97318.name: SP-3Y3-D3R
97318.flavorText: The itsy bitsy spider magnetized onto the water spout.

100875.name: Sanitize
100875.text: Deal damage equal to your Armor to all minions. Forge: Gain 3 Armor first.
100875.flavorText: We were originally going to make a joke about a popular streamer, but one of our designers is a total germaphobe.

97702.name: Sargeras, the Destroyer
97702.text: Titan Battlecry: Open a portal that summons two 3/2 Imps each turn.
97702.flavorText: Formerly the Defender of the Pantheon, he became disillusioned by his mission and formed the Burning Legion to destroy all life within the universe.

101080.name: Saronite Shambler
101080.text: Battlecry: If you've cast 5 or more spells this game, give your hero +4 Attack this turn. ( left!) (Ready!)
101080.flavorText: They play the best rock music at the saro-nite club.

97571.name: Saronite Tol'vir
97571.text: Taunt Whenever this is attacked, draw a card.

98248.name: Serenity
98248.text: Give all enemy minions -2 Attack. Destroy any with 0 Attack.
98248.flavorText: Ra-den loves teaching yoga on his off-hours.

101493.name: Shadowtouched Kvaldir
101493.text: Battlecry: Your next healing effect deals damage instead.
101493.flavorText: Four out of five deck doctors say this works great with Reno Jackson!

97207.name: Shapeless Constellation
97207.text: Battlecry: Transform into an 8/8 copy of a random minion in your hand.

97572.name: Sharp-Eyed Seeker
97572.text: Battlecry: If there is a card in your deck that didn't start there, draw it.
97572.flavorText: If you give it treats, it will give you shiny objects!

101100.name: Shock Hopper
101100.flavorText: Who is shocked about a frog hopping?

101015.name: Sickly Grimewalker
101015.text: After you summon an Undead, give it Poisonous.

96875.name: Sif
96875.text: Spell Damage + (Improved by each spell school you've cast this game!)
96875.flavorText: She is Sif. He is Malygos. They are not the same person. They may have similar spell damage, they may have similar colors but they are different nonetheless.

101660.name: Sigil of Time
101660.text: At the start of your next turn, draw 3 additional cards.
101660.flavorText: Sigil of Right A Down Right A Down.

101016.name: Sinister Soulcage
101016.text: Give a friendly Undead +2/+2. Spend 5 Corpses to summon a copy of it.
101016.flavorText: Also a pretty neat night light!

97052.name: Smelt
97052.text: Give a random minion in your hand +3/+3. Lose 3 Armor to do it again.
97052.flavorText: Due to his heightened olfactory system, Kha'zgoroth is cursed with always being the one that dealt it.

97099.name: Son of Hodir
97099.text: Battlecry: Shuffle four 8/8 Giants into your deck that are summoned when drawn.
97099.flavorText: You look dehydrated, drink some water! Come on, chug! Chug! Chug! Chug!

101077.name: Soulburner Varia
101077.text: After a friendly Undead dies, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero and get a random Shadow Priest spell.
101077.flavorText: Captain's Log. 8/11/2023 There are 60 minutes remaining until the Flavor Text is due. It is Friday at 4 PM. We are out of stamina and ideas. Please send funnies, punnies, quippies, or your finest hahas. - The Design Team

98283.name: Staff of the Primus
98283.text: After your hero attacks, shuffle a random Plague into your opponent's deck.
98283.flavorText: THE PRIMUS, RULER OF MALDRAXXUS, MASTER STRATEGIST, AND wielder of toothpicks!

97626.name: Starlight Whelp
97626.text: Battlecry: Get a random card from your starting hand.
97626.flavorText: Starlight, star bright, first whelp I see tonight.

97404.name: Starstrung Bow
97404.text: Costs (1) less for each friendly Secret that has triggered this game.
97404.flavorText: Shoot for the stars, but if you miss, aim for the enemy hero.

97687.name: Steam Guardian
97687.text: Battlecry: Draw a spell. Reduce the Cost of a Fire spell in your hand by (1).
97687.flavorText: Its boiling steam and erupting magma serve as a pretty good form of 2-Factor Authentication.

95470.name: Stoneheart King
95470.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Earthen that gains +2/+2 for each other Earthen you've summoned this game.
95470.flavorText: I, too, am a king at playing Heart Stone.

97697.name: Stoneskin Armorer
97697.text: Battlecry: If your Armor changed this turn, draw 2 cards.
97697.flavorText: Pretty sensitive for someone made of thick skin.

97726.name: Storm Giant
97726.flavorText: Storm Giant, Frost Giant, Molten Giant... I want Fair-weather and Sunshine Giant!

98224.name: Student of the Stars
98224.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a copy of this into your deck with permanent +3/+3.
98224.flavorText: She is getting her major in Ursa.

101076.name: Tainted Remnant
101076.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, deal 7 damage randomly split between all enemies.
101076.flavorText: A sore sight of eyesores for sore eyes.

97736.name: Tar Slick
97736.text: Minions take double damage this turn. Deal 1 damage.
97736.flavorText: Has +2 Attack on its opponent's turn.

97729.name: Tempest Hammer
97729.text: After your hero attacks, deal 3 damage to the lowest Health enemy.

101557.name: Tentacle Grip
101557.text: Deal 3 damage. Combo: Get a 1/1 Chaotic Tendril.
101557.flavorText: "WINTER VEIL WAS MONTHS AGO, WHY ARE YOUR LIGHTS STILL UP?"

101045.name: Tentacle Tender
101045.text: At the end of your turn, get a 1/1 Chaotic Tendril.
101045.flavorText: It's a messy job but somebody's got to do it. Well, actually, nobody should do this.

98285.name: The Primus
98285.text: Titan After this uses an ability, Discover a card with that Rune.
98285.flavorText: As there is a Pantheon of titans, so is there also a Pantheon of Death, comprised of powerful rulers in the Shadowlands.

98253.name: The Stars Align
98253.text: Transform minions in your hand into ones that cost (3) more. (They keep their original Cost.)

97738.name: Thorignir Drake
97738.text: Rush Whenever this attacks, summon two 3/1 Whelps to attack the target first.
97738.flavorText: Throwing your children at enemies qualifies you for Worst Mother of the Year.

97474.name: Thorim, Stormlord
97474.text: Battlecry: Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals. Draw that many cards.

97397.name: Thornveil Tentacle
97397.text: Lifesteal Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy minion.

97575.name: Time-Lost Protodrake
97575.text: Taunt When you draw this, add a random Dragon to your hand.
97575.flavorText: Weird way to say "late" but ok.

101559.name: Tiny Worldbreaker
101559.text: Battlecry: If you control another Mech, deal 4 damage.

95967.name: Titanforged Traps
95967.text: Discover and cast a Secret. Forge: Do it twice.
95967.flavorText: Always place it underneath their health pack.

97394.name: Tomb Traitor
97394.text: Battlecry: Destroy a Plague in your opponent's deck to deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.
97394.flavorText: You enjoy raiding, I enjoying traitoring. We are not the same.

97682.name: Tram Operator
97682.text: Battlecry: Draw a Mech. The next Mech you play costs (2) less.
97682.flavorText: The guy in the back is screaming… because the train ride is so fun!

97700.name: Trial by Fire
97700.text: Summon five 1/1 Val'kyr with Rush. When one dies, give the others +1/+1.

97671.name: Turn the Tides
97671.text: Give your hero +3 Attack this turn. Summon a 3/3 Elemental with Rush. Overload: (1)

101003.name: Twilight Torrent
101003.text: Choose a character. If it's friendly, restore 6 Health. If it's an enemy, deal 3 damage.
101003.flavorText: I hope it’s the first one.

100992.name: Twisted Frostwing
100992.text: Rush Deathrattle: Summon a Chimaera with stats equal to this minion's Attack.
100992.flavorText: Not currently valid in the Twist format.

98059.name: Tyr
98059.text: Battlecry: Resurrect a 2, 3, and 4-Attack minion from your class.
98059.flavorText: Brought me back to life, S Tyr card.

98626.name: Tyr's Tears
98626.text: Resurrect 3 different minions from your class. Set their stats to 2/2. Forge: Resurrect another.
98626.flavorText: Liek this if u cri evertim

98097.name: Unchained Gladiator
98097.text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Repeat for each Elemental you played last turn. ( )
98097.flavorText: We can't possibly buff this card any more, just look at him!

97642.name: V-07-TR-0N Prime
97642.text: T1T4N This minion's abilities repeat on another random friendly minion.
97642.flavorText: Long after the titans' departure, Mimiron dreamed of creating something with an approximation of their power. He may have actually succeeded!

97053.name: Victorious Vrykul
97053.text: After this attacks, get a 2/3 Val'kyr that costs (1).
97053.flavorText: Get three of these and you have a Trikul.

100995.name: Void Scripture
100995.text: Discover a spell. If you have enough Mana to play it, cast a copy of it at a random enemy.
100995.flavorText: The Old Gods like to think of them as "Addendums."

95917.name: Watcher of the Sun
95917.text: Battlecry: Get a random Holy spell. Forge: Also restore 6 Health to your hero.
95917.flavorText: "I've got my eye on y-AAA I'M BLIND!"

98468.name: Weight of the World
98468.text: Draw 2 cards. Forge: Draw cards until you have as many in hand as your opponent first.
98468.flavorText: Unluckily for him, Azeroth has a tendency to get bigger every 2 years or so.

97619.name: Wing Welding
97619.text: Discard your highest Cost card. Deal damage equal to its Cost to all minions.
97619.flavorText: This is not how you train your dragon.

97132.name: Wisdom of Norgannon
97132.text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each different spell school you've cast this game.
97132.flavorText: Now all we need is the power and courage of Norgannon.

96910.name: X-21 Repairbot
96910.text: Deathrattle: Return any Mechs Magnetized to this to your hand.
96910.flavorText: The circle bolt goes in the square hole.

97462.name: XB-488 Disposalbot
97462.text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all enemy minions. Forge: Gain Lifesteal.
97462.flavorText: You'll be so surprised when you figure out what XB stands for.

101033.name: Yogg-Saron, Unleashed
101033.text: Titan After this uses an ability, cast two random spells.
101033.flavorText: Has been known to monologue before he strikes.
